name: Caba√±a la Bartola
description: It is a collaborative project which I made with a friend. It is a web platform dedicated to offer information and products related to exotic pets such as rabbits, guinea pigs and hedgehogs. The platform includes detailed informative sections such as food, cages and specialized combos.

name: PetMate Landing Page
description: Landing page for my school final project, which was about an App to control a pet feeder, the page was to show the team and what the project is about.

name: PetMate App
description: This is an App where you can control your PetMate (pet feeder), set a time and amount to feed them, have statistics about your pet's nutrition and status of the stock.

name: Aroma's
description: Is a management app for a Uruguayan company, it is used to manage products, orders, shipments, employees, etc. I worked 3 months in the project as a fullstack developer.
